channel.title: {317}K4rn4ge Scape V1{317}
channel.description:
**This is my first time editing/adding things so please post what updates you think should happen**
~Features Of K4rn4ge Scape~ Dragon Clawz - Only 2x Special Though =[ Dragon Plate - Almost Perfect Render Full Zuriels Full Vestas Full Statius Full Morrigans(sides weapons) Full Dagon Hai Staff Position Capes (Thanks Silent CJ) Added Most of Generic SkillCape Emotes Hardly Any Lag (Well To Me Anyways) Very Unigue Starter Fixed Alot of Nulls in Shopz Fixed Annoying Crashing Beard Glitch Thing :P Fixed Eating Food Without A Weapon :| All Skillz Sides Farming and RuneCrafting When the npcs talk i used a commands to make em say that (::vent {message})
Ok On To The Pictures Same Home Will Try To Change In V2 [IMG]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab253/MythicChaos/K4rn4geScapeHome.jpg[/img]
Same Old Shopz(Less Nulls) [IMG]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab253/MythicChaos/K4rn4geScapeShopz.jpg[/img]
Added All These Customz Plus More (look in class8.java) [IMG]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab253/MythicChaos/Customz.jpg[/img]
SkillCapes(missed by like a milisecond :mad: ) [IMG]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab253/MythicChaos/SkillCapes.jpg[/img]
Dragon Clawz Special (2x only couldnt figure out how to do 4x) [IMG]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab253/MythicChaos/DClawsSpec.jpg[/img]
Same Train [IMG]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab253/MythicChaos/K4rn4geScapeTrain.jpg[/img]
All Skillz Sides Farming and Runecrafting [IMG]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab253/MythicChaos/Skillz.jpg[/img]
I No That I Prolly Didn't do much but i added some things and fixed a lot of nulls and made things go correctly into there places and this is my first time and if you would like more pics plz ask
Creditz(I hope I got These Right) 40%-Kingdom Hearts Base 30%-All TuT's I used 15%-Me(K4rn4ge)(added models all in correct place,dclaws spec,Skillcape emotes, and some other things) 5%-All-Star Scape SkillCape Emotes 5%-SilentCJ For Staff Capes 5%-To Whoever Isn't Included Up Above
Thanks For Reading
Download Link Client & Source Pack http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?tzhktmhqzdy
(The Client Says V4 becuase i released different ones to see which i liked bttr)

item.description:
@K4rn4ge wrote:

This is my first time editing/adding things so please post what updates you think should happen

~Features Of K4rn4ge Scape~
Dragon Clawz - Only 2x Special Though =[
Dragon Plate - Almost Perfect Render
Full Zuriels
Full Vestas
Full Statius
Full Morrigans(sides weapons)
Full Dagon Hai
Staff Position Capes (Thanks Silent CJ)
Added Most of Generic SkillCape Emotes
Hardly Any Lag (Well To Me Anyways)
Very Unigue Starter
Fixed Alot of Nulls in Shopz
Fixed Annoying Crashing Beard Glitch Thing
Fixed Eating Food Without A Weapon
All Skillz Sides Farming and RuneCrafting
When the npcs talk i used a commands to make em say that (::vent {message})

Ok On To The Pictures
Same Home Will Try To Change In V2

Same Old Shopz(Less Nulls)

Added All These Customz Plus More (look in class8.java)

SkillCapes(missed by like a milisecond :mad: )

Dragon Clawz Special (2x only couldnt figure out how to do 4x)

Same Train

All Skillz Sides Farming and Runecrafting

I No That I Prolly Didn’t do much but i added some things and fixed a lot of nulls and made things go correctly into there places and this is my first time and if you would like more pics plz ask

40%-Kingdom Hearts Base
30%-All TuT’s I used
